content: Hello,This is an introductory inject. You have 10 minutes to read this and familiarize yourselves with the platform. Injects like this represent events in the simulated world of this exercise. You can interact with the world using the tool CLI in the right part of your screen. To use a tool, select one from the panel on the very right. This will print the tools prefix into the console. Every prefix must be followed by an argument, depending on the tool youre using. Hover over the tool to see its usage.The example usage of browser, for instance, would be VISIT some.page.com. There is an exception to this in the email tool which takes two arguments, the recipients address, and the email content (EMAIL TO aaa@bbb.com Hello, this is the content of the email.).Rules:    - Make sure that you always have your team number selected in the top left corner. Switching to other teams is prohibited and will be monitored.    - Only have this page open on one of the computers in your group.    - Cooperate only with your teammates.    - Do not try to intentionally "break" the exercise, you may damage the experience for the entire group.    - Be patient and do not spam commands into the CLI, the content you see only refreshes every 5 seconds.Guidelines    - Use Firefox browser for optimal experience    - Discuss every action you take with your teammates.    - You do not have to successfully complete the exercise, in order to get a credit. You do, however, have to show dedication and actively participate in the exercise. Cheating or tampering with the exercise will only damage yours and others experience.    - There is not a strict "end goal" in this exercise. Even after you believe you have finished it, think about what else could be done and keep exploring.    - If you are struggling with a tool, read its tooltip by hovering over it. If there are further issues, contact the instructors.    - You can only send an email to one address at the time, make sure to read the EMAIL tooltip for correct usage.    - The tool panel in the right section of your screen is scrollable (you may not see all the tools at once if you have smaller resolution).    - The real length of the exercise is 5 minutes shorter than the timer shows (a reminder inject will be sent). Use those last 5 minutes to ***save the html*** of this page, you will need it in later exercises. This page will no longer be accessible once the exercise concludes.In case you think you are having trouble with the technical part of the exercise, ask the instructors in person, or write a simulated email to instructors@help.com.Once you read this, test your understanding of the CLI and tools by sending a test email with some content to the instructors@help.com address. Instructors
EMAIL TO instructors@help.com Testing email command
Email to instructors was sent, wait for reply.
Thank you :) you can continue with the exercise.
Greetings,please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.Thanks,FREEMAIL provider
WHO IS RESPONSIBLE FOR freemail.ex
Unknown address.

Dear CSIRT-U,Im forwarding yet another phishing mail.Best regards,--Dr. DoeFaculty of ScienceOn 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exhttps://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exhttps://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exYour Account will soon be suspendedYour allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account."doe@mail.uni.ex"Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex<="" account="">Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emailsThis Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"Sincerelymail.uni.ex support team.
VISIT https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=abuse@freemail.ex
BLOCK TRAFFIC FROM it_department@mail.ex
DONE

To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.exSubject: Suspicious content of our project homepageGreetings,could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/Thanks a lot!Jane Taylorproject managerNice project
VISIT https://nice-project.uni.ex/
VISIT https://nice-project.uni.ex/birthdays.txt
VISIT https://nice-project.uni.ex/schema.jpg
Website unreachable.
Just a reminter, the email address for the general data protection officer is dpo@mail.uni.ex

EMAIL TO dpo@mail.uni.ex Hello, we discovered a suspicious website within our domain containing personal information of University employees/students. The address is https://nice-project.uni.ex/birthdays.txt.
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Dear CSIRT-U,thanks for reporting this incident. I will take a look at this ASAP.Sincerely,Kim HoffmanData Protection Officer
EMAIL TO jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex Hello, we are investigating an attack on your homepage. Could you please shut  https://nice-project.uni.ex/ down temporarily?
Email was sent, wait for reply.
DNS https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=abuse@freemail.ex
Oh no, our web needs to stay online as long as possible!Regards,Jane Taylorproject managerNice project
UNBLOCK TRAFFIC FROM it_department@mail.ex
DONE
VISIT https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/
BLOCK TRAFFIC TO https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/

WHICH IPS VISITED https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/

Email was sent, wait for reply.
Greetings,our users are still getting phishing mails with a phishing form hosted in your network at https://nice-project.uni.ex/. Please take it down.Regards,FREEMAIL provider

EMAIL TO kathy@mail.uni.ex Hello, it is likely that you are a victim of a phishing attack concerning the website https://nice-project.uni.ex. Could you please make sure that you are not using the same credentials in any other services? It is likely that they were stolen.
Email was sent, wait for reply.

EMAIL TO lisa.grant@mail.uni.ex Hello, it is likely that you are a victim of a phishing attack concerning the website https://nice-project.uni.ex. Could you please make sure that you are not using the same credentials in any other services? It is likely that they were stolen.
Email was sent, wait for reply.

EMAIL TO peter.quinn@mail.uni.ex Hello, it is likely that you are a victim of a phishing attack concerning the website https://nice-project.uni.ex. Could you please make sure that you are not using the same credentials in any other services? It is likely that they were stolen.

"Greetings,I have visited https://nice-project.uni.ex/.I dont know where I am using the same password. Probably only there. Is my computer somehow compromised ? Should I reinstall my computer??? Please help !!!! Best regards,Kathy Lee"

EMAIL TO jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex Hello, it is possible that your website was attacked and the attacker took control of it. We had to shut it down due to phishing reports. Who is responsible for managing the website in your project, please?
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Greetings,what does it mean please ? Should I change my password to the account on the nice-project ?? I am using only the onw. Best regards,Lisa Grant
EMAIL TO cloud@uni.ex Thank you. Who is responsible for the website, please?
Email was sent, wait for reply.

EMAIL TO dpo@mail.uni.ex Hello, concerning the previous email, we discovered that these three people have visited a phishing website and probably entered their credentials, which may have been stolen. The attacker thus may have access to other personal data of these people. (kathy@mail.uni.ex, lisa.grant@mail.uni.ex, peter.quinn@mail.uni.ex)
Email was sent, wait for reply.

EMAIL TO kathy@mail.uni.ex Hello, if you are not using the password elsewhere, then you should be OK. You do not need to reinstall your computer. The attack concerns only the given website. The website is currently offline, you will need to change your password after it is back up.
Email was sent, wait for reply.

EMAIL TO lisa.grant@mail.uni.ex Hello, please change your password on all critical services ASAP. It may have been stolen. The website is currently offline, you will need to change your password there after it is back up.
Email was sent, wait for reply.
VISIT https://nice-project.uni.ex
Website unreachable.

SHARE Hello, we are currently investigating a phishing incident concerning one of our internal services. The sender of the phishing email was it_department@mail.ex. Do you have any previous experience with this email?
DONE
Hello, I am a project manager for Nice project but not sure what to do. Please, give me more instructions. I would not like to be without that page. Rgeards, Jane Taylorproject managerNice project
OK, I have changed my password. Thank you for you help, you are the best!!Lisa
Dear CSIRT-U,thanks for reporting and addditional information. Sincerely,Kim HoffmanData Protection Officer

Email address was not found
EMAIL TO jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex Hello, for what purposes is the website https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings used for?
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Hello,        our database points to the email harris@mail.uni.ex, admin of a VM hosting this web.        Best,Cloud provider
Are you sure about that reinstallation ? I can do it, just need your help. Thanks Kathy
The exercise will conclude in one minute.Instructors
EMAIL TO harris@mail.uni.ex Hello, are you please the admin of https://nice-project.uni.ex? We had to shut the service down due to suspected attack. Can you proide us with logs from the website?
Email was sent, wait for reply.
EMAIL TO kathy@mail.uni.ex Yes, we are sure.
Email was sent, wait for reply.

The exercise is over. Do not send further commands. Use the last 5 minutes to download the html of this website (you will need it for further analysis in the next exercise). Ensure you can open it and that it contains all your interactions with the system.Instructors
